scripts.watch: concurrently -c gray,blue -k -n hugo,tailwind "npm run watch --workspace hugo" "npm run watch --workspace tailwind"
scripts.watch:gitpod: concurrently -c gray,blue -k -n hugo,tailwind "npm run watch:gitpod --workspace hugo" "npm run watch --workspace tailwind"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build --workspace=tailwind --workspace=hugo
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf public && npm run clean --workspace=tailwind
